price: Deε εwͻ mo nkyεn no bɛtwam, na deε εwͻ Nyankopͻn hᴐ no deε εwͻ hͻ daa. Nokorε sε, wͻn a wͻsii aboterε no dwumadi pa a wͻdiiε no, yεbεma wͻn ho akatua pa paa.
arabic: مَا عِندَكُمۡ يَنفَدُ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ بَاقٖۗ وَلَنَجۡزِيَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوٓاْ أَجۡرَهُم بِأَحۡسَنِ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā ʿindakum yanfadu wamā ʿinda al-lahi bāqin walanajziyanna alladhīna ṣabarū ajrahum bi-aḥsani mā kānū yaʿmalūna
